Accept_Language.description: which languages the client is able to understand
Accept_Language.name: Accept-Language

Authorization.description: request header contains the credentials to authenticate a user
Authorization.name: Authorization

Origin.description: The Origin request header indicates where a fetch originates from
Origin.name: Origin

User_Agent.description:
characteristic string that lets servers and network peers identify
the application, operating system, vendor, and/or version of the requesting
user agent.
User_Agent.name: User-Agent

X_Pinterest_AppState.description:
This request header is set to background if the request is being
made in the "background" state of the app
X_Pinterest_AppState.name: X-Pinterest-AppState

X_Pinterest_App_Type.description:
characteristic string that lets servers and network peers identify
the application, operating system, vendor, and/or version of the requesting
user agent.
X_Pinterest_App_Type.name: X-Pinterest-App-Type

X_Pinterest_Force_User_Country.description: Override user country for the request
X_Pinterest_Force_User_Country.name: X-Pinterest-Force-User-Country

X_Pinterest_Force_User_Gender.description: Override the gender of the user making the request
X_Pinterest_Force_User_Gender.name: X-Pinterest-Force-User-Gender

X_Pinterest_Force_User_Locale.description: Override user locale for the request
X_Pinterest_Force_User_Locale.name: X-Pinterest-Force-User-Locale

X_Pinterest_InstallId.description: Unique ID assigned to pinterest client
X_Pinterest_InstallId.name: X-Pinterest-InstallId

X_Real_Ip.description: Ip address of the client making the request
X_Real_Ip.name: X-Real-Ip

add_fields.description:
A list of attributes of objects to be added to the response ex.
pin.id and "Joins" which is a way to specify additional data fetches ex. add_fields=pin.pinner(),pin.recommendation_reason,pin.place_summary(),interest.images[150x150(ir.24),150x150(ir.48),1200x,236x].
If left empty summary fields will be returned by default.
add_fields.name: add_fields

base_scheme.description: URL scheme to use when building media URLs. (http or https)
base_scheme.name: base_scheme

fields.description:
A list of attributes of objects to be returned in the response
ex. pin.id and "Joins" which is a way to specify additional data fetches ex.pin.buyable_product().
example query param: ?fields= pin.id, pin.buyable_product(), pin.link, user.full_name,
pin.board(). If left empty summary fields will be returned by default.
fields.name: fields

render_style.description:
Set of fields to be returned to the client. ex. ?render_style=detailed
will return the detailed field set for the endpoint.
render_style.name: render_style

enum: The account is already linked to another Pinterest user.

Account with linked business account can not be converted to a business
account.

Account with linked business account can not be converted to a business
account.

allOf.title: Uh oh! You're not old enough to use Pinterest yet.

scopes.manage_ads:
Manage your ad campaigns and see data including spend, budget,
and performance
scopes.manage_merchants: See and manage your Catalog (aka your shopping feed)
scopes.manage_organic:
See, update, and add to your public data (including boards,
Pins, comments, following, followers, and your profile)
scopes.read_ads:
See data on your ad campaigns, including spend, budget, and
performance
scopes.read_advertisers: See your advertising profile and settings
scopes.read_boards:
See all your boards (including secret boards and group boards
you join)
scopes.read_campaigns:
See data on your ad campaigns, including spend, budget,
and performance
scopes.read_domains:
Get your website's most clicked Pins, see the top Pins people
are saving and more
scopes.read_merchants: See your Catalog (aka your shopping feed)
scopes.read_organic:
See your public data (including boards, Pins, comments,
following, followers, and your profile)
scopes.read_pin_promotions: See your ads and ad creative
scopes.read_pins: See all your public Pins and comments
scopes.read_public: See all the public data on Pinterest
scopes.read_secret: See your secret boards and secret Pins
scopes.read_users:
See your public data (including boards, following, profile
etc.)
scopes.read_write: See and change any data on Pinterest
scopes.search_domain: Search for Pins from your website
scopes.search_global: Search all public Pins for you
scopes.write_ads: Create and manage your ad campaigns
scopes.write_advertisers: Create and manage your advertising profile
scopes.write_boards: Create new boards for you, and change your board settings
scopes.write_campaigns: Create and manage your ad campaigns
scopes.write_merchants: Manage your Catalog (aka your shopping feed)
scopes.write_organic:
Create new Pins and boards for you and update your public
data (including boards, Pins, following, followers, and your profile)
scopes.write_pin_promotions: Create and manage ads and ad creative
scopes.write_user_messages: Send messages on behalf of you
scopes.write_users: Change your following boards, Pins and users

/v3/users/settings/.description:
Update a user's settings

    Right now, we can only update publish_facebook and publish_timeline

    Returns:
        A dict representing all of the user's settings.

Pinterest-Version.description:
The X-Content-Type-Options response HTTP header is a marker
used by the server to indicate that the MIME types advertised in the
Content-Type headers should not be changed and be followed.

X-Content-Type-Options.description:
The X-Content-Type-Options response HTTP header is a marker
used by the server to indicate that the MIME types advertised in the
Content-Type headers should not be changed and be followed.

x-pinterest-sli-endpoint-name.description: Name of api handler that was called

x-pinterest-sli-response-type.description: response type to be used for service mesh

/v3/users/settings/.summary:
Update a user's settings

    Right now, we can only update publish_facebook and publish_timeline

    Returns:
        A dict representing all of the user's settings.
